name: Beyond Terra (ChazPotato)
description:
A game where you play as an astronaut crash-landed on an alien planet.

Made in 3 days for the Wowie Game Jam 2.0 by me.

  • A and D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Scroll to change selection
  • Left click to build/break the foreground
  • Right click to build/break the background

Sorry The game isn't longer, or even finished. I intend to keep working on it after the jam :)
